Subtitle1: でも しっかり 聞いてほしいことを⸺ 聞き出してくれたりとか 聞いてくれる
Translation1: But he asked what I wanted him to ask and listened.

Subtitle1: 何か この人になら ついていけるのかなとかって…
Translation1: I felt like maybe

Subtitle1: 思えたのかなって
Translation1: I could spend my life with him.

Subtitle1: さあ エア日本 ええ ただいまですね
Translation1: This is Air Japan, taking off on the runway of happiness.

Subtitle1: 幸せの滑走路を加速中で
Translation1: taking off on the runway of happiness.

Subtitle1: 今 離陸いたしました ありがとうございます！
Translation1: taking off on the runway of happiness. Thank you very much!

Subtitle1: えっ ちょっと待って ちょっと待って こんな感じなん？
Translation1: Wait a second. Everyone's so quiet.

Subtitle1: （オダッチ）ありがとう！
Translation1: Thank you!

Subtitle1: やりました
Translation1: I did it!

Subtitle1: はあ… 幸せ
Translation1: I'm so happy.

Subtitle1: ただ もう これが１つ 問題があるんですよ 対面に
Translation1: But now we'll meet in person.

Subtitle1: わあっと出て行って…
Translation1: If I do this

Subtitle1: いやいやいや 無理 無理 無理 ぐわあってくるし
Translation1: and she's like, "No way. No, no, no," I'd be crushed.

Subtitle1: “無理”みたいな
Translation1: Like, "Nope."

Subtitle1: めちゃくちゃ そこが不安ですね 一番
Translation1: That's what I'm most nervous about.

Subtitle1: （男性） 今 いるのが当たり前になってる
Translation1: Now it's like she's always there.

Subtitle1: （男性）これすごい 逃げられてると思って
Translation1: I think she's avoiding me.

Subtitle1: （女性）家族を作るっていう イメージが⸺ まだ私の中では湧いてない
Translation1: I can't picture starting a family with him yet.

Subtitle1: （男性） どこで間違えてんだろうな
Translation1: I wonder where I went wrong.

Subtitle1: （女性）そもそもこの企画に 乗り気じゃないし
Translation1: …not wild about this experiment to begin with.

Subtitle1: （男性）でも 俺の気持ちは ちゃんとあるから ちゃんと手を伸ばして 待ってるよっていう
Translation1: I really do have feelings. I'm waiting for you.

Subtitle1: （女性）分かんないんだよね これだったら１人でいたほうが いいじゃんってなる
Translation1: I don't understand. It's like I'm better off alone than like this.

Subtitle1: （男性）嫌いです こういうのは好きじゃないし
Translation1: I hate this. I don't really like this kind of thing.

Subtitle1: （女性）プロポーズと現在⸺
Translation1: The moment you proposed to me and the present is different.

Subtitle1: 私は どんどん どんどん かけ離れていってる
Translation1: It's feeling further and further away.

Subtitle1: （男性）お互いぶつかるじゃない （女性）ぶつかってなくない？
Translation1: You're going to clash. Are we clashing?

Subtitle1: （男性）昨日までは 続けたくないって思ってた
Translation1: I didn't want to continue up to yesterday.

Subtitle1: （女性）男の人として すごい好きみたいなのが⸺ 降りてないっていうだけ
Translation1: I just don't feel that kind of affection for him as a man.

Subtitle1: （男性）俺は だから ずっとブレてないから 俺は ずっと好きだからさ
Translation1: I won't sway. I will always love you.

Subtitle1: （男性）俺が知りたいのは⸺ 条件ではなくて 気持ちなんだよ
Translation1: It's not conditions I want to know about. It's how you feel.

Subtitle1: （女性）信じたい
Translation1: I want to believe.

Subtitle1: （男性）10年後も20年後も 同じように横で笑ってくれたら
Translation1: Ten years, 20 years from now, I hope you're still smiling by my side.
